1:
Yahweh, who may stay in your tabernacle?\q Who may live on your holy hill?
\q
2:
Whoever walks blamelessly, does what is right\q and speaks truth from his heart.


\q
3:
He does not slander with his tongue,\q he does not harm others,
\q and he does not insult his neighbor.


\q
4:
The worthless person is despised in his eyes,\q but he honors those who fear Yahweh.
\q He swears to his own disadvantage and does not take back his promises.
\q
5:
He does not charge interest when he lends money.\q He does not take bribes to testify against the innocent.
\q He who does these things will never be shaken.
